must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: Send a reminder when it's time to refill
Give me the option to consult a pharmacist before refilling
Allow me to select different pickup times
deal_breakers: I've changed my mind about taking this medication
I want to consult my doctor before refilling

decision_factors: Ability to navigate online health portals

technical: Something modern but I don't know what that means
A system that can handle refills, I guess
Maybe something with good performance, whatever that is
non_technical: I think I need reminders but I'm not really sure how they work
I heard having a pharmacist available is important but I don't know why
I want it to be simple, but also complex enough to handle everything, if that makes sense

must_meet: It should be affordable, but I'm not sure what that means exactly
I need it to work in some way that feels right to me
should_meet: I think it should allow for flexible pickup options, but I'm not too sure
It might be nice if it has an online feature, but I don't really use those
I heard something about user-friendly interfaces being good, but I'm confused
nice_to_meet: If it could send me alerts, that would be cool but I'm not counting on it
I would like to consult a pharmacist, but I don't know how often that's necessary
